fulltext:
Vu Viet Trien 
Hi Sir or Madam, 
I am Trien Vu, a 5 year experience software developer especially in .NET technology. 
My working experience in various international and domestic projects at FPT Software, 
one of the biggest software firm in Vietnam, and Vincommerce has equipped me with 
strong .NET skills, managerial skills, and the ability to collaborate with different 
individuals. 
I believe that my professional and educational background would help me to fit the 
requirement of the software developer position 
"

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 
• 
Good skills in IT with 5 years’ experience including application development, 
implementation, deployment, internal and customer support. 
• 
Comprehensive knowledge and experience in C#, ASP.Net, MVC, SQL server, SharePoint 
and related technologies 
• 
Ability in working independently and in team-work approaches 
• 
Adapt with new working styles easily 
• 
Work with high responsibility and enthusiast 
• 
Work either independently or cooperatively 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
LNAR 2 
01/2012 – 07/2012 
Projects 
LNAR 2 
Objectives 
FPT  will  migrate  106  Lotus  Notes  applications  to  DB-approved  target 
platforms.  DB’s  PMO  will  determine  and  communicate  to  FPT  within  the 
agreed timeframe (see Project Duration) the Lotus Notes applications, which 
should be migrated to DB approved target platforms. 
This project’s objective is to provide end-to-end application and data migration 
Services for DB’s Lotus Notes Applications. The target platforms would be 
Microsoft   Windows   SharePoint   Services   (“WSS”),   Java,   J2EE,   .NET 
and open source (a combination of Apache, Tomcat, MySQL and PHP) etc. 
(collectively, “Services”). 
Customers 
Deutsche Bank, US

Project Name 
Objectives 
FAP.Maintenance 
FPT maintained 16 accounts of Singapore Government: EP (Enterprise Portal), 
ACRA (Accounting and Corporate Regulatory Authority), MOE (Ministry of 
Education), MOF (Ministry of Finance),...which included more than 200 
applications works on many platform: .Net, Java, SharePoint, .... 
FPT resolved all issues from accounts, ensured the system works smoothly and 
developed new functions.

Adayroi

Built up and maintained Adayroi system. It was an eCommerce system which 
belonged  to  Vingroup  Joint  Stock  Company.  We  developed  website 
adayroi.com and all of its backend modules (for example Transport management 
system,  Order  management  system,  Customer  service  system,  Merchant

Vingroup.
